00027 #include "Vector3D.hpp"

00037 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00038 
00039 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Mesquite::Vector3D &v)
00040 {
00041     return s << v[0] << ' ' << v[1] << ' ' << v[2];
00042 }
00043 
00044 double Vector3D::interior_angle(const Vector3D &lhs,
00045                                 const Vector3D &rhs,
00046                                 MsqError& err)
00047   {
00048     double len1 = lhs.length();
00049     double len2 = rhs.length();
00050     double angle_cos = (lhs % rhs)/(len1 * len2);
00051     if (!finite( angle_cos ))
00052     {
00053       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00054       return 0.0;
00055     }
00056     
00057     // Adjust the cosine if slightly out of range
00058     if ((angle_cos > 1.0) && (angle_cos < 1.0001))
00059       {
00060         angle_cos = 1.0;
00061       }
00062     else if (angle_cos < -1.0 && angle_cos > -1.0001)
00063       {
00064         angle_cos = -1.0;
00065       }
00066     
00067     return std::acos(angle_cos);
00068   }
00069 
00070 }
